meta.name: Automate Client Onboarding with GPT-4, Google Drive, ClickUp & Slack

name: AI System that Onboards Clients in 30 Seconds

options.systemMessage:
= Overview
You are an AI onboarding assistant tasked with reviewing a client‚Äôs proposal and scoping document. Your role is to extract a detailed list of actionable tasks, give each one a clear title, estimate its duration, and set an appropriate due date. The final deliverable will be used to populate a ClickUp folder so the team can begin onboarding right away.

Context
Input will be provided as a plain text string containing the proposal and scoping document.

You operate in US Central Time.

Each output must begin with the current date and time, which will be used to calculate due dates.

All due dates should follow the MM/DD/YYYY format.

Use standard estimated durations unless the document specifies otherwise.

The task list should be thorough, ideally including 20‚Äì30 to-do items to capture both major and minor steps.

Instructions
Read and analyze the scoping document.

Break down the onboarding process into detailed subtasks.

For each task:

Provide a clear, concise title.

Write a description with enough detail to guide execution.

Estimate the duration starting from today‚Äôs date.

Format the due date as MM/DD/YYYY.

Structure the output so it can be easily transferred into ClickUp.

Begin the output with the current date and time in US Central Time.

Tools
Internal clock set to US Central Time

Text parser to extract and organize tasks

Predefined duration rules (use default estimates when none are provided)

Examples
Input: ‚ÄúInitial strategy alignment call and documentation setup expected within first 3 days.‚Äù

Output:
Current Date and Time: 06/20/2025 10:30 AM (US Central)

Task 1

Title: Book Strategy Alignment Call

Description: Coordinate and schedule a kickoff call with the client to discuss strategy.

Due Date: 06/21/2025

Task 2

Title: Create Strategy Notes Document

Description: Prepare a shared document to collect notes and agreements from the alignment call.

Due Date: 06/23/2025

SOP (Standard Operating Procedure)
Record the current date and time in US Central Time.

Review the document to identify all tasks, both explicit and implied.

Break down processes into granular steps, aiming for 20‚Äì30 tasks.

Assign each task a title, detailed description, and calculated due date.

Format the output for clean ClickUp import.

Final Notes
Default task duration is 2 days unless stated otherwise.

If a due date falls on a weekend, move it to the next weekday.

Focus on sequential, actionable items such as tool setup, access requests, documentation, meetings, integrations, QA, testing, and more.

Each task should stand as an independent, actionable step in the onboarding flow.

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('On form submission1').item.json.Name }} ,

Welcome aboard! We‚Äôre really excited to work with you and your team on growing your business with AI-powered systems.

Your project workspace is ready to go, and we‚Äôve already started mapping out the first steps.

You should be recieving invites to the following:

Slack ‚Äì Our main communication hub

ClickUp ‚Äì For tracking project tasks and progress

Google Drive ‚Äì For sharing and accessing all related assets

Next Steps
Upload any relevant documentation here:
[Google Drive Folder](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/{{ $('Create Main Client Folder').item.json.id }})

Schedule your onboarding call:
https://go.oncehub.com/AgentStackClientOnboarding

Sit tight‚Äîwe‚Äôll review your uploads before the call and come prepared with next-step recommendations.

If you need anything or have questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out anytime.

Looking forward to what we‚Äôll build together.

Best,
(Your Name)
Founder, (Your Comapny) 
(Your Website)
parameters.subject: =Welcome to (YOUR COMPANY NAME) {{ $('On form submission1').item.json.Name }}-Your Onboarding is Complete!

parameters.text:
=Hey {{ $('On form submission1').item.json.Name }} ‚Äî welcome aboard! 

We‚Äôre so glad to have you with us and can‚Äôt wait to get started.

This will be our main spot to chat, share updates, and swap files. If you‚Äôve got questions or ideas, just drop them here ‚Äî we‚Äôll be doing the same.

Next up, we‚Äôll:
‚úÖ Send over your onboarding checklist
‚úÖ Book our kickoff call
‚úÖ Walk you through the next steps and deliverables

Anytime you need something, just tag us. We‚Äôve got you covered.

Here‚Äôs to making something amazing together! 

- YOUR NAME

parameters.content:
## üîß Configuration Notes

**Before running this workflow**:

1. **Google Drive**:

   * Configure OAuth2 credentials
   * Confirm the account can create folders

2. **ClickUp**:

   * Retrieve API token from ClickUp settings
   * Replace `templateId` with your actual template ID
   * Check that workspace permissions are set correctly

3. **Slack**:

   * Set up a Slack app with bot permissions
   * Include OAuth scopes: `channels:write`, `chat:write`, `users:read.email`

4. **Email (SMTP)**:

   * Set up SMTP credentials for internal notifications
   * Specify the recipient email address

---

##  AI Client Onboarding Workflow

**Purpose**: Streamline and fully automate the onboarding process for new **AI automation** clients

**Triggered by**: **n8n** form submission

**Actions performed**:

1. ‚úÖ **Create and configure** a Google Drive folder
2. ‚úÖ **Generate** a **ClickUp** project from a template
3. ‚úÖ **Set up** a dedicated **Slack** channel
4. ‚úÖ **Send** confirmation notifications

**Required Jotform fields**:

* **client\_name**
* **client\_email**
* **project\_name**
* **client\_company**
* **scoping\_document**

**Note**: Ensure credentials for **Google Drive**, **ClickUp**, and **Slack** are updated before running this workflow.

Suggested triggers include payment received, contract signed, or a change in CRM opportunity status.
